top_comments_top.body: I’d always wondered what would happen if someone combined Mirror’s Edge and F-Zero, guess I don’t have to wonder anymore. Looks good though
Looks super sick! can you send link of your steam page?
Looks good, I might check it out. However, I did misread the name as "celery" so that's what I'll be calling it from now on.
